entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Razor page call "component.razor" causes a problem in VS2022 #36995
  • Blazor Webassembly Integrity Check Fails - Publish #36994
  • Unknown error occurred while trying to verify Failed to find a valid digest in the 'integrity' attribute for resource wth computed SHA-256 integrity #36993
  • Response.Cookies.Append cannot set cookie value without encoding #36992
  • Loading an image with InputFile control doesn't work correctly and freeze the app. Blazor Server App targeting .NET 6 RC1 #36991
  • Reading form with invalid content throws NullReferenceException #36987
  • fail `dotnet watch run` CS0246 The type or namespace name 'App' could not be found #36985
  • Single file build time improvement: proxy-yarp #36982
  • Startup regression: mapaction #36981
  • An asp.net core web api application, using "UseWindowsService", reports an error “System.NotSupportedException: The content root changed. Changing the host configuration is not supported ” when starting the service #36979

Closed

  • Startup regression: updates #36974
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps #36980
  • SignalR can not get user identifier from ClaimsPrincipal #36918
  • Chrome (93) Disconnect SignalR Connection Exactly After 5 Minutes #36801
  • Startup improvement: endpoint, json #36943
  • Provide easy access to Razor page runtime metadata #34759
    Discussions

PullRequests

Created

  • Normalize the content root and improve errors #36990
    area-runtime, feature-minimal-hosting
  • Try `v5.0.401` .NET SDK #36989
    area-infrastructure
  • Remove FakeStartup classes #36988
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Use F# task ce in worker template #36986
    area-mvc, community-contribution

Merged

  • Fix constant name typos #36984
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Get dotnet cores on Linux / macOS #36824
    area-infrastructure
  • Support binding to form and form file parameters in minimal actions #35158
    community-contribution, feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks
  • [release/6.0] Fix http logging log typo #36950
    area-runtime
